snippet.title: Solar Raiders - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Grab your guns! 
Robi Studios, developer of the acclaimed platformer Blue Fire, is hyped to announce its upcoming title “Solar Raiders'' a challenging fast paced third-person bullet hell roguelite set to release in 2025. 

Eager Raiders can wishlist & download a free Demo now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2379010/Solar_Raiders/

After being kidnapped by The Big Boss, raiders will have to gear up, suit up and shoot out on an intergalactic mission to steal the Solar Core…and most likely fail. Go solo or team up with friends, overcome enemy packed dungeons, raid, loot, unlock powerful skills, create unstoppable builds and prepare to die.

Follow Robi Studios on X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/RobiStudios
Join the Robi Studios Discord: https://discord.gg/robistudios
